document_data.caption: The goddess Selûne wearing her scale mail.
document_data.name: Selûne's scale mail
document_data.location: [[Gates of the Moon]]{{cite book/Faiths and Avatars|134}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Selûne's scale mail''' was a powerful magical [[armor]] worn by the [[Selûne|goddess]] and sometimes loaned to her servants.Selûne's scale mail is unnamed in ''[[Faiths & Avatars]]'' but is given stats for 2{{nd}}-edition rules. It is not included in Selûne's statistics in ''[[Faiths and Pantheons]]'' for 3{{rd}} edition, but appears in artwork of the goddess.
document_data.Usage: Selûne donned her scale mail only in battle, but occasionally lent it to beings performing a quest or other task for her, but without losing any of its protection herself.
document_data.Description: It comprised a suit of perfectly circular scales of opalescent appearance that glowed faintly with silver light.
document_data.Powers:
[[File:Selûne vs Shar.jpg|thumb|right|''Selûne wearing her scale mail in battle against Shar.'']]
When lent to mortals around [[1369 DR]], it was a suit of ''[[scale mail]] +5'', combining the powers of ''[[Blending (quality)|blending]]'' and ''[[plate mail of etherealness]]'', but with the weight and encumbrance of ''[[elven chain mail]]''.
